front.title: ARP/ND Synching And IP Aliasing without IRB

abstract.t: This draft discusses serveral signalling modes of EVPN Signalled L3VPNs. EVPN Signalled L3VPNs are used to improve L3VPNs for some new use cases. Then it discusses which style of RT-5 routes can be selected for these new use cases, and why they are selected.
